text: YOU: Hi Sahil, can you tell me something cool that Mihir has been up to recently? SAHIL: Sure! Mihir is currently focusing on developing his cybersecurity skills by participating in Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions and actively completing challenges on platforms like Hack The Box. YOU: That's awesome! Thanks for sharing, Sahil. SAHIL: No problem at all! Take care!
notMyTurn: SAHIL: I think Sanya wanted to talk to you...
